title: 12/22/20 HOUR 3 - Nick Wright
itunes:title: 12/22/20 HOUR 3 - Nick Wright
description:
Dan discusses the return of the NBA with Fox Sports 1's Nick Wright. Wright discusses his early season bets for awards and best teams.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
